subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Favors scored 18 points and the Utah Jazz outscored the Pacers by 33 points in the second half for a 97-76 victory Saturday night in Indianapolis.
snippet: Derrick Favors scored 18 points and the Utah Jazz outscored the Pacers by 33 points in the second half for a 97-76 victory Saturday night in Indianapolis.
